reviews.content: Family restaurant, private room, cozy space, delicious food, fresh food. Season to taste. The owner is super cute and adorable. Price commensurate with quality.
Goc Pho Restaurant has beautiful VIP rooms and delicious food. The first time I ate braised goat testicles, it was so great.
The food is so delicious, every dish is great! Especially Ban San and goat curry, you will never forget it after eating it, everyone ü•∞üçÄ Anyone who gathers in District 4 should come here ‚Ä¶
Delicious food, super cute service
Delicious and nutritious stewed goat testicles at Goc Pho restaurant
Delicious food meets taste
Clean restaurant, friendly staff
Good service. Delicious food. Reasonable price. My family and I will support regularly.
Reasonable price, delicious food and Vip room at beautiful Street Corner restaurant
This is just a disguised restaurant so everyone should avoid it.

reviews.content: Tasty food for this Standard of local restaurant. Usual prices. Pity that less popular brands of beer are usually not available cold ( add ice!) The open balcony overlooking the bustling street along the river is pleasant. Options for ‚Ä¶

First they do not have English menus, nor does anyone there speak good English.  It was somewhat entertaining eating here. First they brought warm beer as soon as we sat down. We asked for cold beer to which we only got a puzzled look. Then ‚Ä¶
Came for a late lunch.  Unfriendly service and trash and paper are all over the floor and dirty chairs.  Food and price are OK though. ‚Ä¶
Haha, nice place to meet and talk with brothers and friends.
Ok
Good food, good portion sizes, well-priced, river view.
Nothing special, food is ok, service is ok. Good view
